Scene:
The Woods of the Tenjin Shrine
(Tenjin no mori / 天神森)

Play: The Love Suicides at Sonezaki (曽根崎心中)

Production: July 1970

– Click image to view.



Narrators (Tayu):

Toyotake Komatsudayū II (豊竹小松大夫 (二))

Toyotake Sakitayū (豊竹咲大夫)

Toyotake Hanabusadayū III (豊竹英大夫 (三))



Shamisen Players:

Nozawa Kichibei IX (野澤吉兵衛 (九))

Nozawa Katsuhei II (see also Nozawa Kizaemon III) (野澤勝平 (二))

Tsuruzawa Seiji (鶴澤清治)

Tsuruzawa Katsunosuke (鶴澤勝之輔)



Performers:

Puppeteer Character Kashira
Yoshida Eiza II
(吉田栄三 (二)) 		Ohatsu
(天満屋お初) 		Musume
(娘)
